/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The sky itself is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the gray and white of the buildings. The overall effect is a dynamic and lively snapshot of urban life in Beijing.
